posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping. Payment by check, m/o, or paypal gift (preferred). Feel free to PM or email [url]6drew@msn.com[/url]. I'm also open to reasonable offers.  This is a very nice card - the top front by Huggins name shows a faint image of what looks like the reverse image of the legs and glove of Bresnahan on the back. Thanks for looking. Drew

Sold

is 115 shipped okay? If so, mark sold and I will send you a money order tomorrow.

Thanks 
Dan koteles

Dan,

An email has been sent to you. The card will be listed as sale pending until I hear back from you. 

Thanks,
Drew
I am sending you a m.o tomorrow- thanks Dan Koteles

Dan, I was going to ask if you sent payment yet as it hasn't been received. I'll email you my address . Drew
